name: Iron Ore
description: A common ore containing iron that can be smelted into metal.

name: Copper Ore
description: A raw material containing copper, useful for crafting and trading.

name: Lumber
description: Wooden logs processed into planks, essential for construction.

name: Stone
description: Basic building material often used in construction and crafting.

name: Wild Berries
description: Edible berries found in the wild, suitable for simple recipes.

name: Herbs
description: Various medicinal and culinary plants used for potions and cooking.

name: Gold Nugget
description: A small piece of pure gold, valuable and often used for currency.

name: Clay
description: Malleable material used in pottery, construction, and crafting.

name: Wool
description: Fiber obtained from sheep, used for textiles and crafting.

name: Fish
description: Edible aquatic creature, a common food source for many cultures.

name: Coal
description: Carbon-rich mineral used as fuel and for smelting metal ores.

name: Crystal Shard
description: Fragment of a larger crystal, often used in magical or mystical rituals.

name: Honey
description: Sweet and viscous substance produced by bees, a natural sweetener.

name: Obsidian
description: Volcanic glass with sharp edges, used for tools, weapons, and jewelry.

name: Silk
description: Luxurious and fine thread produced by silkworms, used for textiles.

name: Uranium
description: Radioactive element used as a power source or in advanced technologies.

name: Diamond
description: Precious gemstone valued for its brilliance and used in jewelry.

name: Salt
description: Crystalline mineral used to season food and preserve ingredients.

name: Amber
description: Fossilized resin, often used for crafting and decorative purposes.

name: Quartz
description: Common crystal with various uses in technology, magic, and decoration.

name: Wood
description: Basic material obtained from trees, used for construction and crafting.

name: Stone
description: Basic building material often used in construction and crafting.

name: Berries
description: Edible fruits found in nature, often used for simple dishes.

name: Copper
description: Malleable metal, essential for crafting and technological advancements.

name: Fiber
description: Plant-based material used for crafting textiles and basic items.

name: Clay
description: Malleable material used in pottery, construction, and crafting.

name: Fish
description: Edible aquatic creature, a common food source for many cultures.

name: Coal
description: Carbon-rich mineral used as fuel and for smelting metal ores.

name: Water
description: Essential liquid for hydration, cooking, and various processes.

name: Mushroom
description: Fungal growth with various culinary and medicinal uses.

name: Monster Hide
description: Durable hide obtained from defeated monsters, used for crafting.

name: Fang
description: Sharp tooth or pointed organ extracted from creatures, often used in weaponry.

name: Claw
description: Sharp and sturdy appendage from animals, useful for crafting and combat.

name: Bone
description: Hard skeletal structure of creatures, utilized in crafting and tools.

name: Slime
description: Viscous and gooey substance with various magical and practical applications.

name: Cracked Crystal
description: Flawed crystal with reduced mystical properties, still valuable for certain crafts.

name: Rat Tail
description: Long and slender tail from rodents, used in potion making and alchemy.

name: Insect Antenna
description: Sensitive sensory organ of insects, sometimes used for magical purposes.

name: Feather
description: Lightweight and pliable feather, commonly used in crafts and ornamental designs.

name: Chitin
description: Strong and lightweight exoskeleton material from insects, useful for armor and tools.
